website_summaries.verdict: LED fixture works best in tandem with a larger, room-illuminating light. Installation is tricky due to odd wire colors, but the ability to re-position individual lights is A+.
pros: Each light on the fixture rotates 360 degrees
LEDs provide daylight illumination but give off no heat
cons: Somewhat difficult to install, and wire colors do not correspond to U.S. standard
Occasional complaints about short-lived durability, "cheap" look, and poor illumination

customer_reviews.title: Love the new lights.
customer_reviews.text: Huge upgrade from what I had. The lights themselves are adjustable to fit whichever way you prefer. Great price, easy install and overall 5 stars for me. LED is so much better than incandescent bulbs, brighter and cleaner looking light.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Check the wire harnesses and make sure none of your wires are compromised
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my last review I received a replacement for my last light. The coatings on the wire are not compromised! However the only item that would be nice to see them at on this product is a grommet in the hole at the wire goes through! This would assist on not having the wires compromised in the future! I’m sure that the light has good brightness but I can’t comment on that since it’s not installed yet!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Instant update
customer_reviews.text: These transformed my mid century bathroom! I was worried about brightness in our medium sized bathroom, but these are perfect. Once I figured out which breaker to shut off, they were easy to install- I’m a somewhat handy woman who know the difference between a Phillips and a flathead, there you go... nice lights, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Verboom

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were terrible but eventually we figured how to cut the wires ...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were terrible but eventually we figured how to cut the wires and splice black to brown, blue to red and ground. That was frustrating! Light is VERY dim. Our bathroom is very small and it is tolerable. However, warning to anyone wanted a lot of light, this will not suffice. It is very dim. Otherwise, quality was excellent. Look is very modern.
customer_reviews.author: Goye McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking light bright enough
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works as expected. I actually have a two room bathroom and this one is over the medicine cabinet and is just slightly wider. I also have a 5 light model ,which is wider than most standard vanity lights and also works very well. The cool white light is much closer to daylight than warm white (yellow).
customer_reviews.author: Leonard D.

customer_reviews.title: These lights are Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are fantastic! I used them in a bathroom I am renovating. They are very modern looking. They came packaged in a nice black felt bag. Very impressive. The lights actual swivel. I like mine vertical. It really show cases the glass shower and modern faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R

customer_reviews.title: They're really cool looking, just not real bright
customer_reviews.text: These won't light up a mirror enough to say, put your makeup on. The review of them said the same thing, however. And I'm old and can't see all that well without my glasses anyway. They're really cool looking, just not real bright.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Not enough light and too small...it flashes on and off every 5seconds had to return it twice..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my bathroom..it didn't work so I returned it..I like the light and thought it was a defective one..I ordered another one and again it was not working!!it kept flashing on and off..I returned it yet again and decided not to buy this item..stay away it's too small and not bright at all plus it flashes on and off every 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Modern Design but harsh LED light.
customer_reviews.text: this light fixture is gorgeous. So modern. My only issue is the LED is rather harsh. I have it in my Mid Century Modern Guest Bath. Looks fantastic. Just wish the light was not so harsh. Hubby installed it.
customer_reviews.author: CWBRI

customer_reviews.title: How to get it to play music sometimes my phone rings through it sometimes it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: I have a Google home and sometimes the light bulb plays music and I can hear my phone click on a text message and I still can't figure it out
customer_reviews.author: Andrea bartolomucci

customer_reviews.title: Light fixture doesn’t work for long
customer_reviews.text: Light stopped working after a year and half. There is no way to replace the bulbs, so it is not worth buying this light fixture if you have to replace the whole thing within two years. I wouldn’t have bought it if I had known it only lasts for a year and half.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 years with very little use
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 years of sporadic use, the light in this fixture started being less and less bright. Some times it would blink continuously and some other times it wouldn’t turn on. One day it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: So far, no adverse effects
customer_reviews.text: Great value, the previous light is not good, and the size is immeasurable after changing this one. Used in the small bedroom, it has been installed so far, and it has been used all the time without any bad effects.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice, easy to install. White light but soft for your eyes. Love it. Now I want another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but quite dim.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice looking fixture, but mine had a small part missing so one of the squares sat crooked, so QC isn't too good. I wish I'd paid better attention to the specs, it's a very dim light for a bathroom, about like a 40w incandecent. Maybe the warm color would have been a bit better, but still very dim.
customer_reviews.author: Siamonsez

customer_reviews.title: Nice light if you want a modern solution.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, modern looking light. Easy to install with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Had to by quickly (had no light in bathroom). This worked out perfectly.... still working
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hug

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of these for our bathroom vanity remodel ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for our bathroom vanity remodel. Two years to the day, one of them stops working. Initially, I could see a faint light inside the fixture, but that went away quick. I though LEDs were supposed to last a long, long time, since you cannot replace the bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy. I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.text: The design is marvelous and the lamp works perfectly. People ask me where I bought it because it's something different and it looks gorgeous on my bathroom. Installation was easy. I recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Demon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights, fits perfectly, easy to install and matches our modern style bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this light
customer_reviews.text: Was not a fan of this at all. Wasn’t too hard to install, if you know what you’re doing. Upon installation, I tried using it during my shower and the previous, though very outdated, light fixture worked 10x better. I reinstalled the old outdated fixture and left the other one sitting in its box.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and I get complements on it
customer_reviews.text: I put the lights above my makeup table in the bedroom and it gives good enough light. It also looks good and does not take away from the decoration.
customer_reviews.author: R. Finta

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great....a superb value! The warm white light is excellent. I just wish it had been available in a brushed nickel or stainless steel finish, but it's good anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Herrington

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: These lights are just the look I was going for in my new bathroom! They look really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brown

customer_reviews.title: New Vanity Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I love the appearance. I have a small bathroom, bought two sets of this fixture so I had to adjust to the brightness. Found the ability to change the lighting direction very eye catching. Received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sleek look
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lights, but the first one I received was damaged. It was bent in the center and completely unusable. I contacted the company and they sent a replacement, but aside from that, It has a beautiful sleek look. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful modern lights. The only LED ones in daylight. Very bright too.
customer_reviews.author: Bijal Pathak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look great and expensive. Perfect for my industrial bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.author: JAI

customer_reviews.title: Good quality its different
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 Stars only because I prefer things really bright the light is great buy it I am satisfied you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: PACHECO

customer_reviews.title: No longer works 9 months later
customer_reviews.text: Loved this light at first had for about a year. And for the past few months it turns off after about 30 min of on time. Makes it tough to shower in the dark all of a sudden
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very good looking fixture.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, bright LED white light. I love that you can angle the 2 outside lights. Took me less than 20 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fixture compliments my newly renovated bathroom. I was skeptical about the brightness..no more worries.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan V.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait to installed it since the construction of my bathroom took longer that expected. Once installed it look nice and work perfectly but in 6 weeks it no longer worked. I had my electrician look at it and he said that it was the "starter" ( I do not know what the exact name for it). Since it out of warranty I can not get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Gochez

customer_reviews.title: I can't see, due to lack of lumins.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool design, very modern. However, it doesn't cast enough light for a vanity. You would need four of these to emit enough light for task lighting in a bathroom. Poorly though out.
customer_reviews.author: XAlaskan

customer_reviews.title: Looks GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Looks Great, easy to install, superior quality and lights the area very well
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE MANGUM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and looks for even better price
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, very good quality, bright enough to illuminate bathroom but not blindingly bright, easiest 5 stars I ever gave.
customer_reviews.author: Justyna Sasak

customer_reviews.title: excellent bathroom vanity light.  Bright white light.
customer_reviews.text: excellent light. nice and bright and costs hardly anything to have on. I love this LED . would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would be great in a closet maybe to light it up
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a modern LED light in my bathroom. This light is both of these, however, its not bright enough for a small bathroom. It would be great in a closet maybe to light it up, but not a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Clair Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective lighting
customer_reviews.text: Lit up my bathroom way better than the 3 light unit I had in there before.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I assume you get what you pay. I ordered 2 of those lights. Did the installation of the first one and the light was flashing. A waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Did a slight remodeling of my bathroom and this vanity light added that new modern look. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Herron

customer_reviews.title: Why are these lights blueish?
customer_reviews.text: The light isn't very warm with these. It's a little more blue than the rest of the lights in the bathroom and it's noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: James M Gallina

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: Very modern looking and I put them in both bathrooms. Have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased
customer_reviews.text: Well made , light is perfect for vanity make up , shave ect.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great modern looking bathroom light, much nicer than anything one may find at Home Depot. Give it a try!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful touch.
customer_reviews.text: It look awesome. It give to a bathroom a touch of elegance and is easyest to install as you expected.
customer_reviews.author: Felix R. Latorre

customer_reviews.title: We bought these fixtures for our re-finished bathroom less than ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these fixtures for our re-finished bathroom less than a year ago. One has already burnt out, and the other one is flickering and about to die too. These are not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lights, every time someone comes to my house they fall in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Daiana

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not enough light to use in powder room. Light color so different from ambient light it hurts.

customer_reviews.title: bent mounting bracket
customer_reviews.text: had to make adjustment to the mounting bracket in order to get the correct alignment.

customer_reviews.title: Super bright white, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, super bright white light fills the room and looks good.

customer_reviews.title: gives off a different light than standard fixtures
customer_reviews.text: packaging was nice and the small string led lights was a nice touch

customer_reviews.title: This item is the best Higher quality then all other brands
customer_reviews.text: This item is the best Higher quality then all other brands

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: very sleek and contemporary; matches our new bathroom! love it!

customer_reviews.title: It looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had instructions, but it wasn't that difficult to mount (for a beginner like me). I love the true cool white color and the sleek design of this product. Definitively recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Jorge P

customer_reviews.title: I put this in my bathroom to replace a fluorescent ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my bathroom to replace a fluorescent fixture. This is much nicer and the lighting is not harsh at all. It looks very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Skiffington

customer_reviews.title: Although the design is very nice, the lighting is too low and dimmed
customer_reviews.text: Although the design is very nice, the lighting is too low and dimmed. It's barely enough for a small bathroom. I wish it had light bulbs with higher wattage.
customer_reviews.author: Panino

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look even better in person. I really like the lights and was able to install them myself easily.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, simple, clean
customer_reviews.text: Elegant, simple, clean, just the right brightness for my bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Good product !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it easy to put it worth the money 💞💞

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't watt to install these They look great. Bathroom is being remodeled.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking lights, but not bright enough to light a 5' x 8' bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Magic light
customer_reviews.text: Great value; could be better if the connecting wires were longer. Rotating feature is very neat.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Best Modern Light
customer_reviews.text: The light looks remarkable. All three of the lights rotate so that you can leave it however you prefer. It gives plenty of light to light up a bathroom. It is one of the best lights for a modern bathroom that I could find. If you have any problems with the light, Letsun's customer service is exceptionally amazing. They were able to aid me in timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Moises

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very modern design and really adds the edgy touch to the bathroom that I was looking for.

customer_reviews.text: Light fixture was very easy to install and looks great as well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: ... worked wonders for just the right lighting and worked perfect above our new medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 foot by 5 foot bathroom and it worked wonders for just the right lighting and worked perfect above our new medicine cabinet.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a wow factor compared to the old light
customer_reviews.text: My husband says that it's too bright for a guest bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Design is still sooo nice and modern If you need little light then ok ...
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited for these lights ... had them installed today and it’s hardly any light coming out .. soo beyond dimmed. The bathroom is small and was all dark. I don’t know if I can return and was forced to buy a fixture from store for $350 (to make sure it’s enough lumen). Design is still sooo nice and modern If you need little light then ok for you. Not my case.

customer_reviews.title: Love these and the light they give
customer_reviews.text: Would do over and over. Love these and the light they give.

customer_reviews.title: Not a warm light
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this bright white and not a warm light as it is advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Letsun LED Vanity llight
customer_reviews.text: Really like and satisfied with my purchase. I will order more for another room. 5 stars for his product. Recommend this yo friends & family.

customer_reviews.title: I just hooked the light up and it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I just hooked the light up and it does not work. We can not return it due to we bought two months ago when we are renovating a house
customer_reviews.author: barry garner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty cheap. Flimsy build. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sathish

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the overall size but it works after put ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture was deceptive. It is not as big as the picture. Disappointed with the overall size but it works after put it in another spot.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: this is really bad photo shopping
customer_reviews.text: this is really bad photo shopping, in the picture it makes the lights look like they are 6 feet long! They are beautiful and seemed to be well made but we ended up sending them back because they were small and just weren't big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joel and Colleen

customer_reviews.title: LED modern light fixture short life
customer_reviews.text: This led light is beautiful for tight space and looks quite modern and classy. We were very happy with our purchase and the fact that the led lights would last for many years. Well, after just two years of use (remember, it was above a sink so being used only for about two hours a day) all three bulbs went out at the same time. No power surge, no strange burn odor, no force of any kind. When we contacted the company that distributes them they only offered a discount toward purchasing a new fixture. Disappointed. Do buy the extended warranty if you’re set on buying this light.
customer_reviews.author: coolMom1976

customer_reviews.title: Attractive light but difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to install. The instructions did not explain how to make the electrical connection with the module provided. The holes in the wall plate did not align with the electical box and had to be installed at an offset. As a result, there's a 1/4" gap between the light and the wall. Luckily, it's not too noticable.
customer_reviews.author: John Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Modern Light
customer_reviews.text: Used for a guest bath remodel, light looks modern and aesthetics are nice. Quality of fasteners are poor. It puts out a decent amount of light but would consider a larger model if I was to do it again - I ordered the 3 light and would suggest ordering the 4 light. Shipped quickly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Picked out and purchased for my customer’s bathroom facelift. Customer absolutely loves it as do I
customer_reviews.author: D. Bickerton

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Design
customer_reviews.text: The lights were installed fast and easily. They are attractive and work well.
customer_reviews.author: silvia elias

product_meta.title: LED Vanity Light, LETSUN 21.8inch Modern Bathroom Light Fixtures Over Mirror for Bathroom Vanity Lights in Chrome and Acrylic with 360° Rotation, 6000K Cool White Make-up Mirror Front Lamp
feature_bullets: ★ NOBLE DESIGN WITH 360° ROTATION:Modern and linear design give your bathroom a new and relax ambiance. Every light can be rotated 360 °, that flexible design to create more decoration idea for your bathroom.

★ENERGY SAVING & SUPER BRIGHT :SMD2835 creates stable and efficient light, which instant-on, NO dazzling, NO glare with frosted acrylic cover. LED technology saves up to 80% electricity compare to conventional light bulbs and lifespan up to 50,000 hours.

★SAFETY & WORRY-LESS: Letsun vanity lights with CE/ROHS certificated, and IP20 waterproof and dust proof driver, which can be mounted in your bathroom or other damp areas. HIGH transmittance with acrylic cover, gives you perfect spotlight when you makeup, shave, read or display products. Stainless steel body with acrylic plating surface, durable, safe and easy to clean.

★ EASY & QUICK INSTALLATION: No switch or cord installation needed. The mirror front lamp is suitable to the US junction box standard. JUST connect to the reserved wire directly and fix with the screws, which installation time within 30 mintues.

★ WIDE APPLICATION & WARM SERVICE: The modern LED vanity light design is ideal for using as lighting in bathrooms, bedrooms, hallways, corridors, study rooms, stairways, workplaces, restaurants, etc. More light ideas pls visit our store. If you have any questions with the lights, please do not hesitate to contact us, we will give you the best solution within 24 hours, allowing you to rest assured
